languages.text: "Как и многие {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкеры{/g}, не ведающие о своем проклятии — в тот момент, когда сильная эмоциональная реакция вызвала непроизвольный отклик". {n}Хейнрикс молчит. Потом вздыхает и неохотно продолжает.{/n} "Я вскипятил укусившего меня ручного гринка двоюродной тетки". {n}Дознаватель отводит взгляд и еще тише добавляет.{/n} "А потом и ее саму, когда она закатила мне пощечину".

traits.locale_text: "Как и многие псайкеры, не ведающие о своем проклятии — в тот момент, когда сильная эмоциональная реакция вызвала непроизвольный отклик". {n}Хейнрикс молчит. Потом вздыхает и неохотно продолжает.{/n} "Я вскипятил укусившего меня ручного гринка двоюродной тетки". {n}Дознаватель отводит взгляд и еще тише добавляет.{/n} "А потом и ее саму, когда она закатила мне пощечину".

languages.text: "Like many {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} unaware of their curse, I found out when a strong emotional reaction triggered an involuntary response." {n}Heinrix falls silent. Then he sighs and reluctantly continues,{/n} "My great-aunt had a pet grink. One day, it bit me, and I boiled it from inside out." {n}The Interrogator looks away and adds more quietly,{/n} "And when my great-aunt slapped me for what I'd done, I boiled her too."

Потом вздыхает и неохотно продолжает.{/n} "Я вскипятил укусившего меня ручного гринка двоюродной тетки". {n}Дознаватель отводит взгляд и еще тише добавляет.{/n} "А потом и ее саму, когда она закатила мне пощечину".

Then he sighs and reluctantly continues.{/n} "My great-aunt had a pet grink. One day, it bit me, and I boiled it from the inside out." {n}The interrogator looks away and adds more quietly,{/n} "And when my great-aunt slapped me for what I'd done, I boiled her too."

One day, it bit me, and I boiled it from inside out." {n}The Interrogator looks away and adds more quietly,{/n} "And when my great-aunt slapped me for what I'd done, I boiled her too."

languages.text: “我当时和很多不知道自己遭到诅咒的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}一样，是在强烈的情绪刺激之下，不由自主地发动了能力。”{n}海因里希陷入了沉默，之后叹了口气，不情愿地继续开了口。{/n}“我的姑姥有只宠物格林克。有一天，它咬了我一口，结果我把它从里到外全煮熟了。”{n}审讯官看着远方，以更低的声音补充道。{/n}“姑姥因为这件事情打了我一耳光，而我把她也煮熟了。”
languages.original_text: "Like many {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} unaware of their curse, I found out when a strong emotional reaction triggered an involuntary response." {n}Heinrix falls silent. Then he sighs and reluctantly continues,{/n} "My great-aunt had a pet grink. One day, it bit me, and I boiled it from inside out." {n}The Interrogator looks away and adds more quietly,{/n} "And when my great-aunt slapped me for what I'd done, I boiled her too."

traits.locale_text: “我当时和很多不知道自己遭到诅咒的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}一样，是在强烈的情绪刺激之下，不由自主地发动了能力。”{n}海因里希陷入了沉默，之后叹了口气，不情愿地继续开了口。{/n}“我的姑姥有只宠物格林克。有一天，它咬了我一口，结果我把它从里到外全煮熟了。”{n}审讯官看着远方，以更低的声音补充道。{/n}“姑姥因为这件事情打了我一耳光，而我把她也煮熟了。”

languages.original_text: "Like many psykers unaware of their curse, I found out when a strong emotional reaction triggered an involuntary response." {n}Heinrix falls silent. Then he sighs and reluctantly continues,{/n} "My great-aunt had a pet grink. One day, it bit me, and I boiled it from the inside out." {n}The Interrogator looks away and adds more quietly,{/n} "And when my great-aunt slapped me for what I'd done, I boiled her too."

languages.text: «Al igual que muchos {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g} que desconocen su maldición, tuve mi revelación cuando una fuerte reacción emocional causó una respuesta involuntaria». {n}Heinrix se queda en silencio. Después, suspira y continúa con reluctancia.{/n} «Mi tía abuela tenía un grink como mascota. Un día me mordió y lo herví por dentro». {n}El interrogador aparta la mirada y añade en voz más baja:{/n} «Y cuando mi tía abuela me dio una bofetada por ello, la herví también a ella».
languages.original_text: "Like many {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} unaware of their curse, I found out when a strong emotional reaction triggered an involuntary response." {n}Heinrix falls silent. Then he sighs and reluctantly continues,{/n} "My great-aunt had a pet grink. One day, it bit me, and I boiled it from inside out." {n}The Interrogator looks away and adds more quietly,{/n} "And when my great-aunt slapped me for what I'd done, I boiled her too."

traits.locale_text: «Al igual que muchos {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g} que desconocen su maldición, tuve mi revelación cuando una fuerte reacción emocional causó una respuesta involuntaria». {n}Heinrix se queda en silencio. Después, suspira y continúa con reluctancia.{/n} «Mi tía abuela tenía un grink como mascota. Un día me mordió y lo herví por dentro». {n}El interrogador aparta la mirada y añade en voz más baja:{/n} «Y cuando mi tía abuela me dio una bofetada por ello, la herví también a ella».

languages.text: 「呪いに気づいていない多くの{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}と同じように、私は強い感情的反応が無意識の反応を引き起こしたときにそれに気がついたのだ」{n}ハインリックスは黙り込む。そしてため息をつき、しぶしぶこう続けた。{/n}「大叔母が、グリンクを飼っていた。ある日それに噛まれた私は、衝動的にそれを内側より燃やした」{n}インテロゲイターは顔をそらし、静かに続けた。{/n}「そして私は、私を叩いてきた大叔母もまた、同様に燃やしたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Like many {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} unaware of their curse, I found out when a strong emotional reaction triggered an involuntary response." {n}Heinrix falls silent. Then he sighs and reluctantly continues,{/n} "My great-aunt had a pet grink. One day, it bit me, and I boiled it from inside out." {n}The Interrogator looks away and adds more quietly,{/n} "And when my great-aunt slapped me for what I'd done, I boiled her too."

traits.locale_text: 「呪いに気づいていない多くの{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}と同じように、私は強い感情的反応が無意識の反応を引き起こしたときにそれに気がついたのだ」{n}ハインリックスは黙り込む。そしてため息をつき、しぶしぶこう続けた。{/n}「大叔母が、グリンクを飼っていた。ある日それに噛まれた私は、衝動的にそれを内側より燃やした」{n}インテロゲイターは顔をそらし、静かに続けた。{/n}「そして私は、私を叩いてきた大叔母もまた、同様に燃やしたのだ」

languages.text: "Wie viele {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g}, die sich ihres Fluchs nicht bewusst sind, erfuhr auch ich davon, als eine starke emotionelle Reaktion eine unfreiwillige Antwort auslöste." {n}Heinrix verstummt. Dann seufzt er und fährt widerwillig fort: {/n}"Meine Großtante hielt sich einen Grink als Haustier. Eines Tages biss er mich und ich kochte ihn von innen heraus." {n}Der Interrogator blickt zur Seite und fügt etwas leiser hinzu:{/n} "Und als meine Großtante mir dafür eine Ohrfeige gab, kochte ich auch sie."
languages.original_text: "Like many {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} unaware of their curse, I found out when a strong emotional reaction triggered an involuntary response." {n}Heinrix falls silent. Then he sighs and reluctantly continues,{/n} "My great-aunt had a pet grink. One day, it bit me, and I boiled it from inside out." {n}The Interrogator looks away and adds more quietly,{/n} "And when my great-aunt slapped me for what I'd done, I boiled her too."

traits.locale_text: "Wie viele {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g}, die sich ihres Fluchs nicht bewusst sind, erfuhr auch ich davon, als eine starke emotionelle Reaktion eine unfreiwillige Antwort auslöste." {n}Heinrix verstummt. Dann seufzt er und fährt widerwillig fort: {/n}"Meine Großtante hielt sich einen Grink als Haustier. Eines Tages biss er mich und ich kochte ihn von innen heraus." {n}Der Interrogator blickt zur Seite und fügt etwas leiser hinzu:{/n} "Und als meine Großtante mir dafür eine Ohrfeige gab, kochte ich auch sie."

languages.text: « Comme beaucoup d'autres {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} ignorant tout de la malédiction qui les touche, je m'en suis rendu compte lorsqu'une forte réaction émotionnelle a déclenché une réaction involontaire. » {n}Heinrix reste silencieux quelques instants, puis il pousser un long soupir et poursuit :{/n} « Ma grand-tante avait un grink de compagnie. Un jour, il m'a mordu et je l'ai fait bouillir de l'intérieur. » {n}L'interrogateur détourne le regard et ajoute presque en murmurant :{/n} « Et quand ma grand-tante m'a giflé pour me punir, elle a subi le même sort. »
languages.original_text: "Like many {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} unaware of their curse, I found out when a strong emotional reaction triggered an involuntary response." {n}Heinrix falls silent. Then he sighs and reluctantly continues,{/n} "My great-aunt had a pet grink. One day, it bit me, and I boiled it from inside out." {n}The Interrogator looks away and adds more quietly,{/n} "And when my great-aunt slapped me for what I'd done, I boiled her too."

traits.locale_text: « Comme beaucoup d'autres {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} ignorant tout de la malédiction qui les touche, je m'en suis rendu compte lorsqu'une forte réaction émotionnelle a déclenché une réaction involontaire. » {n}Heinrix reste silencieux quelques instants, puis il pousser un long soupir et poursuit :{/n} « Ma grand-tante avait un grink de compagnie. Un jour, il m'a mordu et je l'ai fait bouillir de l'intérieur. » {n}L'interrogateur détourne le regard et ajoute presque en murmurant :{/n} « Et quand ma grand-tante m'a giflé pour me punir, elle a subi le même sort. »

languages.text: "Bu lanetten bihaber nice {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} gibi yoğun duygular yaşadığım bir anda, istem dışı olunca fark ettim." {n}Heinrix susuyor. Ardından iç çekip gönülsüzce devam ediyor.{/n} "Büyük halamın beslediği bir grink vardı. Bir gün beni ısırdı. Ben de içini dışına çıkardım." {n}Sorgucu, uzaklara dalıp daha sessiz bir tonda ekliyor.{/n} "Büyük halamdan tokadı yiyince bu sefer onu da yaktım."
languages.original_text: "Like many {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} unaware of their curse, I found out when a strong emotional reaction triggered an involuntary response." {n}Heinrix falls silent. Then he sighs and reluctantly continues,{/n} "My great-aunt had a pet grink. One day, it bit me, and I boiled it from inside out." {n}The Interrogator looks away and adds more quietly,{/n} "And when my great-aunt slapped me for what I'd done, I boiled her too."

traits.locale_text: "Bu lanetten bihaber nice {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} gibi ben yoğun duygular yaşadığım bir anda, istem dışı olunca fark anladım." {n}Heinrix susuyor. Ardından iç çekip gönülsüzce devam ediyor.{/n} "Büyük halamın beslediği bir grink vardı. Bir gün bu, beni ısırdı. Ben de içini dışına çıkardım." {n}Sorgucu, uzaklara dalıyor ve daha sessiz bir tonda ekliyor.{/n} "Büyük halamdan tokadı yiyince onu da yaktım."
